title: Second division football leagues in Europe ranked by revenue 2011/12
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Football League, and Income (in million euros) in each Football League on the y axis.
Football League Championship (England) has the highest Income (in million euros) and Segunda Division (Spain) has the lowest Income (in million euros).
Football League Championship (England) has 2.94 times more Income (in million euros) than Football League Segunda Division (Spain) which is has the lowest.
